resources.string: A media stop broadcast will NOT be sent.
A media stop broadcast will be sent.
A media pause broadcast will NOT be sent.
A media pause broadcast will be sent. Might start other players.
If set, SleepTimer will turn on airplane mode.
If set, SleepTimer will turn off bluetooth.
Minutes the music should continue after shaking.
After a signal you can extend the SleepTimer by shaking.
Turn the volume for notifications off.
Choose another not supported application to be stopped by SleepTimer.
Choose your music application which should be started with the launch button.
If set, SleepTimer will turn off WiFi.
Music player has not been set in preferences.
Loading applications. This might take a while...
Loading running services. This might take a while...
Minutes until your music slowly fades out. After fading your player will be stopped.
We are now going to sleep.
When clicking on the button below it will open your e-mail application where you can enter the feedback/request/bug report.
If you want a new player to be supported please let your player run music and then send this feedback including the running services. Please mention the name of your player in the feedback.
Could not start the application. Automatic bug report has been sent.
Checking if rooted phone. If a message box comes, grant root.

Your phone has root (looks like it). All music applications and as well own set application should be able to be stopped. After this message please grant root access to SleepTimer. And mark "always grant access" so that SleepTimer will be able to stop the Music Application at the certain time without you having to confirm it. If your phone does not have root, only a few applicatoins will be stopped.

Your phone has no root access. Some applications supporting the Media Pause Button will be stopped. Others will not. If Google will allow me to kill other Applications again in future Versions, this will be possible again. But for now it is impossible.
Your Android phone has no root.
